tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RiskAssessmentData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    risk_score FLOAT,
    trading_strategy VARCHAR(255),
    entry_point DECIMAL(10, 2),
    exit_point DECIMAL(10, 2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE TradingStrategies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    parameters JSON,
    created_on TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE RiskAssessmentData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stock_symbol VARCHAR(50),
  risk_score FLOAT,
  date_assessed DATE
)

CREATE TABLE NeuralNetworkModels (
  model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name VARCHAR(50),
  layers INT,
  activation_function VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE TradingStrategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
  risk_tolerance FLOAT,
  model_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE RiskAssessmentData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stock_symbol VARCHAR(50),
  risk_score FLOAT,
  date_assessed DATE
)

CREATE TABLE RiskAssessmentData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  risk_score FLOAT,
  asset_name VARCHAR(255),
  risk_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE NeuralNetworkStrategies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
  layers INT,
  activation_function VARCHAR(50),
  training_data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE TradingAssets (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_id INT,
  asset_name VARCHAR(255),
  current_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  market_cap DECIMAL(20, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE TradeHistory (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trade_id INT,
  asset_id INT,
  quantity DECIMAL(10, 2),
  buy_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  sell_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  profit_loss DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE trades (
    trade_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR,
    trade_date DATE,
    trade_type VARCHAR,
    quantity INT
);
